item.title: Ad Creatives & VSL Videlo Editor for an Advertising Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an experienced video editor to edit promotional material such as Instagram, Facebook, TikTok and YouTube Ads, as well as VSLs in the space of high-ticket coaching, consulting and high-ticket service providing.

Additional role could be imagery editing and complete ad creative strategizing. However, it is not necessary.

Apply if you're a young, energetic and maybe even a little too obsessed about crafting extraordinary ads and VSLs that sell!



Budget: $1,000

Category: Video Editing

item.title: Motion Graphics Video Editor needed for UGC ad agency - Upwork
item.description:
THE MAIN TASK:
- I actually need an editor specializing in motion graphics to create social media ads just like/better than this one:
https://app.foreplay.co/share/ads/kr0C2CJhLZteLPL7SUmA?user=Dan%20Ragan

Please send in a sample of your work that is similar to this ^

THE OPPORTUNITY
- Our UGC ad agency (http://www.ugcfactory.io) is seeking a part-time video editor responsible for editing VSL's for me.

WHY WORK WITH ME?
- 10+ years experience building organizations from the ground up, managing teams of 15+ full-time employees, ensuring project milestones are hit, and consistently delivering for clients on-time and within budget.
- I'm dedicated to ongoing learning and make sure I share this knowledge with the people I work with. You'll have access to my proprietary database of productivity tools + tutorials + recommendations, something I've invested thousands of hours + dollars to create and regularly maintain.
- Developed automation systems that deliver results with limited resources... and form the backbone of my approach to organization building.

Hourly Range: $40.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 00:42 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Advertisement, Testimonial Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Mixed Media
Skills: Advertisement, Testimonial Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Mixed Media
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Drone Footage Editor for Property Marketing Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to transform raw drone footage of a property into an engaging marketing video. The video will be used to showcase the property and attract potential buyers. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and an artistic eye for creating visually appealing content.

I'd like the end product to look something like this: https://youtu.be/aTmdNByI2G0?si=RXlo-0QRZak7WMcf
The raw video I have isn't very good, but I'm hoping we can use it to make something appealing.

        Skills required:
        - Video editing
        - Drone footage editing
        - Creative storytelling
        - Color grading
        - Audio synchronization
        - Music selection

Hourly Range: $11.00-$18.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 00:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial

item.title: Social media manager - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a social media manager to grow my PR and marketing agency to support us with a range of clients. The role will include but not be limited to:

- Social media strategy
- Content Creation including graphic design, video editing (Canva is fine)
- Social media management for platforms including Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and TikTok
- Social media growth
- Caption writing
- Influencer marketing including identification, outreach, reporting and communication
- MailChimp support
- Generate and build out social media content calendars
- Schedule content
- Hashtag research
- Community engagement
- Able to communicate and liaise with clients
- Manage the creation, curation, and scheduling of engaging and relevant content across various social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Tik Tok), ensuring consistency in brand tone of voice and messaging.
- Develop and implement effective social media strategies aligned with the overall marketing goals. Stay up to date on industry trends, emerging platforms, competitor activity and best practices to ensure a competitive edge.

To be successful for this role, you must have:

- Preferably minimum of 3 years of experience working within or alongside agencies
- A social media portfolio that shows your work
- Attention to detail
- High standards of communication, including well-spoken and written English
- Experience working with lifestyle brands such as hospitality, cars
- Able to communicate daily to the team and work alongside the director and team members
- Proven track record of growing audience following and engagement through creative, relevant and inspiring content.
- Must have examples of content creation available to present
- Ability to identify the latest trends and viral moments and jump on these opportunities as they arise.
- Experience working with content creators and influencers
- Effective time management, with the ability to work under pressure to meet tight deadlines
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills
- Ability to create basic graphics eg. posts & stories in Canva or similar; plus edit video content eg. Adobe Rush, Cap Cut and/or Instagram highly regarded.




Posted On: June 18, 2024 00:13 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram Story, Graphic Design
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram Story, Graphic Design
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.description:

I need to create luxury reels for luxury real estate and lifestyle. I have 4k drone footage and 4k video footage.

No music but color grading needed. I have a lot of footage for b-roll of what Im talking about but may need other affects too

item.title: Video Content Capture for Product Demo - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We're a small Boston-based startup launching a next-generation walker for people with disabilities. We're looking to capture some product demo-related content.

We're more or less looking for b-roll footage with walker users and Physical Therapists that we'll use in different ways across our website, trade show booth content, etc as we launch to market. More information about our product and company can be found at www.nuviomobility.com.

The right person for the job will have to be available in person in the greater Boston area. This job will likely also lead to future video production efforts. Thanks!



Hourly Range: $36.00-$66.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 23:37 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
